entry.title: Hydrologic Outlook issued June 16 at 3:21PM MDT by NWS
entry.summary: Very warm temperatures has returned this afternoon and will continue through at least Sunday. These temperatures, combined with windy conditions, will result in significant high-mountain snowmelt once again.
